REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2155 reute d f BC-GULL-<GLL>-GETS-MCDON 06-01 0079

TEXT.TITLE: GULL <GLL> GETS MCDONELL DOUGLAS <MD> CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Gull Inc said it has received a contract initially worth about 1,500,000 dslrs to supply McDonnell Douglas Corp with the control system for an On-Board Inert Gas Generating System to be used in the new C-17A military transport cargo airport. It said under production options in the coutract, it could supply controllers for up to 210 aircraft, raising the value of the contract to over 25 mln dlrs. Reuter
